original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā kosambiyam viharati ghosita ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena brāhmaṇena saṅghassa payopānaṁ paṭiyattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarena brāhmaṇena saṅghassa payopānam paṭiyattam hoti
aññataraḥ naṭa pubbakaḥ bhikkhu evam āha
sabbaḥ uyam maññe saṅgho sītīkato ti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu saṅghaṁ ārabbha davaṁ karissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhu saṅgham ārabbha davam karissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, saṅghaṁ ārabbha davaṁ akāsī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva bhikkhu saṅgham ārabbha davam akāsi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, saṅghaṁ ārabbha davaṁ karissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa saṅgham ārabbha davam karissasi
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: “na, bhikkhave, buddhaṁ vā dhammaṁ vā saṅghaṁ vā ārabbha davo kātabbo.
analyzed: na bhikkhave buddham vā dhammam vā saṅgham vā ārabbha davaḥ kātabbaḥ

original: Atha kho bhagavā taṁ bhikkhuṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tam bhikkhum aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbhara tāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha
na surusurukārakam bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca surusurukārakaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca surusurukārakam bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
